text: Ma ur t tsellkem, ihi, Isellek it Oebbi, mi t ssuff$en wid ijehlen. Wissin n sin, mi llan deg ifri, mi inna i umeddakwel is: "kkes a$wbel, Oebbi, s tidep, yidne$". Issers ed Oebbi talwit iS fellas, Iaawen it s iasekriwen, ur ten twalam. Isse$li mavi awal n wid ijehlen. Awal n Oebbi, neppa, aalay sennig akw. Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
